text:
A team of Income Tax Department officials reportedly carried out a raid at the head office of the Erode-based Renaatus Projects Private Limited at Mullamparappu in the city.

The raid that began in the morning went on till evening, sources said. The company, which has been into infrastructure and property development for decades, is the concessionaire for the on-going ring road project for Erode city.
title: TAMIL NADU
